## Config File Path

* [~/.config/fcitx/profile](config/fcitx/profile)
* [~/.config/fcitx/conf/fcitx-classic-ui.config](config/fcitx/conf/fcitx-classic-ui.config)


## Howto


### install

``` sh
$ ./install.sh
```

or

``` sh
$ make install
```


### package-install

``` sh
$ ./package-install.sh
```

or

``` sh
$ make package-install
```


### config-install

``` sh
$ ./config-install.sh
```

or

``` sh
$ make config-install
```
